__e: But there is a sense of justice being done here, and I am a lawyer, and, Lemon, you do not understand the pain that was...
Lemon, I cannot marry you, not when a part of me is in love with someone else.
Lemon wasn't my destiny, so now it's my job to go find out who that destiny is.
I'm having a little dinner party tonight to welcome Lemon home, and I expect you, her best friend, to be there.
Look, I know how you feel about Lemon, and, well, there's nothing between her and me anymore.
It just wouldn't be the same without you and Lemon there, and she already said yes.
